artist: Artist: Cherubino Alberti; Artist: After Polidoro da Caravaggio
creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: caped man at center holding a blade up behind him; and angel holds the blade; figure kneeling on a pedestal with hands bound behind their back in front of central figure; flock of animals at bottom L
inscription: Lettered on altar at right center \'POLIDORVS DE CARAAGIO IVE\'; \"ILL.so Principi Laurentio Card. Magalotto / Haereder Cheruybini Alberti D.D.D.?; at lower right \'ROMÆ CAB\'
title: Abraham Sacrificing Isaac
